original_title: Hotel employee arrested for sexually harassing German woman
original_body_lines: An employee of a massage clinic in a tourist hotel in the Habaraduwa area was arrested on suspicion of sexually harassing a German woman who called over at the hotel to have a massage.
The 65-year-old tourist complained to Habarduwa police that the suspect felt her secret parts with his fingertips while massaging.
The 45-year-old suspect hotel employee was a resident of the Imaduwa area.
A police team under SI Wimal is conducting further investigations on the instructions of OIC Habaraduwa police CI Asoka Karunaratne.(D.G,Sugahapala)
